thread.title: ‘Single’ Jennifer Lopez admits she fancies Harry Styles over Brad Pitt leaving Drake in the shade
thread.title_full: ‘Single’ Jennifer Lopez admits she fancies Harry Styles over Brad Pitt leaving Drake in the shade

author: Marcus BARNES
title: ‘Single’ Jennifer Lopez admits she fancies Harry Styles over Brad Pitt leaving Drake in the shade
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JENNIFER Lopez chose Harry Styles over Brad Pitt and a series of hunks during a game of Who’d You Rather on the Ellen Show this week. 
Leaving rumoured lover Drake in the shade, the 47-year-old shot down stars including Zac Efron, Prince Harry, Nick Jonas and Chris Martin. Scope Features 5 Jennifer Lopez chose Harry Styles over a series of hunks in a game of Who’d You Rather on The Ellen DeGeneres Show 
Wearing a baby pink shirt matched with a pink mini skirt featuring unusual, ruffled detailing down the front, and gold strappy heels Jennifer was in high spirits on the show hosted by Ellen DeGeneres. 
Kicking off the cheeky game, Ellen announced: “She says she’s single at the moment”, leading J-Lo to burst out laughing. 
Neither confirming nor denying Ellen’s assertion, J-Lo couldn’t stop laughing and shaking her head. 
The 59-year-old added: “She’s too busy and doesn’t have time for first dates and stuff.” Scope Features Brad Pitt gets the heave-ho as J-Lo sticks with Harry Scope Features The singer was in high spirits throughout the show Latest TV & Showbiz YUMMY MUMMY Here's the latest you need to know on Steph Davis and her baby boy with Jeremy McConnell 'IT'S BEEN VERY STRESSFUL' Chloe Khan reveals stress after stalker hell and admits police visit her 'every time she's home' TOTTENHAM BOY Who is Skepta? Mobo and Mercury Prize winning artist performing at the BRIT Awards 2017 - all you need to know HE'S THE DADDY The confirmed father of Caben-Albi is getting to know his son - here's what we know about Jeremy McConnell HORROR-NATION STREET Corrie's Rob Mallard reveals Daniel Osbourne 'could be a killer' after finding out Sinead's pregnant GIGGLE BUDDIES This Morning’s Holly and Phillip descend into giggles AGAIN as she can't pronounce 'effortlessly' GREATEST DAY Howard Donald misses Gala night of Gary Barlow's The Girls Musical after wife goes into labour SO TIRED Peter Andre complains he and wife Emily MacDonagh are still struggling with sleepless nights with baby Theo Past problems Danielle Lloyd reveals she is 'so insecure' she will have a 'therapist on speed dial forever' WHO'S THE DADDY? Corrie's Sinead Tinker discovers she's pregnant but is it Daniel Osbourne or ex Chesney Brown's? BUSINESS PARTNERS Lauren Goodger reveals she's lost 10lb in two months and is going into business with jailbird boyfriend PLAY DATE Holly Willoughby coos over baby boy before he jumps off the sofa and runs around the This Morning studio 
Ellen’s naughty game involved showing the contestant (J-Lo) pictures of two male pinups and asking her who she would rather ‘do’. 
The first pair were Harry Styles and Zac Efron, to which J-Lo said: “It’s funny cos I could do either. This is actually a very tough decision, probably a couple of years ago I would have said Zac Efron, but now I’d say Harry Styles.” 
She had the audience cracking up throughout the game, which continued with images of Nick Jonas, Brad Pitt, The Weeknd, Chris Martin, and more. 
Each one was rejected in favour of Harry Styles, until Lenny Kravitz popped up and the ex-One Direction star’s run finally came to an end. Scope Features J-Lo looked stunning in her pink outfit which showed off her impeccable legs Instagram 5 Jennifer told the chat show host that she doesn’t date younger men 
Leonardo DiCaprio then triumphed very quickly over Lenny, staying in J-Lo’s favour ahead of Big Sean, Taye Diggs, Derek Hough Ed Sheeran, and Jamie Foxx. 
24K Magic singer Bruno Mars then usurped DiCaprio, with Bradley Cooper pipping Bruno and Harry Styles eventually becoming ultimate victor. 
She laughed as the final choice was made, and said: “He’s a little bit young for me!” 
Jennifer went on to explain that she doesn’t date younger men, after being quizzed on her relationship with Drake. 
Ellen asked about rumours that she is dating Drake, who is 17 years younger than her, to which J-Lo said: “I don’t date younger men. It’s not like you have to be younger. It’s not about that. I just meet people and then if I go out with them, I go out with them. And if I like them, I like them. And if I don’t, I don’t. It’s about the person. It’s about who they are. It has nothing to do with age.”
